casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Charles WALKER. No. 76A95-5. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 5, 2006. Paul M. Green, Durham, Jonathan L. Megerian, Asheboro, for Charles Walker. Jonathan P. Babb, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Stuart Albright, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Attorney General on the 14th day of July 2006 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Guilford County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th day of October 2006."
